schema.title: Vitest
schema.description: Generate a Vitest setup for a project.

project.description: The name of the project to test.

uiFramework.description: UI framework to use with vitest.

inSourceTests.description: Do not generate separate spec files and set up in-source testing.

skipViteConfig.description: Skip generating a vite config file.

testTarget.description: The test target of the project to be transformed to use the @nx/vite:test executor.

testEnvironment.description: The vitest environment to use. See https://vitest.dev/config/#environment.

runtimeTsconfigFileName.description: The name of the project's tsconfig file that includes the runtime source files. If not provided, it will default to `tsconfig.lib.json` for libraries and `tsconfig.app.json` for applications.
